publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4145 Brian Adam: Sports Facilities—That the Parliament commends Scotland’s Commonwealth Games team and, in particular, our swimmers for their current successes in Melbourne; notes that these successes have happened in spite of the lack of high-standard facilities throughout Scotland, and calls on the Scottish Executive and sportscotland to increase the number of competition-standard facilities, including 50-metre swimming pools, across the nation.
S2M-4145 Sports Facilities (lodged on 20 March 2006) Donald Gorrie*, Michael Matheson*, Christine Grahame*

S2M-4145 Sports Facilities (lodged on 20 March 2006) Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Mr Andrew Arbuckle*, Carolyn Leckie*, Mike Pringle*, Bruce Crawford*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Shiona Baird*, Richard Lochhead*
S2M-4145 Sports Facilities (lodged on 20 March 2006) Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Fiona Hyslop*, Eleanor Scott*

S2M-4145 Brian Adam: Sports Facilities—That the Parliament commends Scotland’s Commonwealth Games team and, in particular, our swimmers for their current successes in Melbourne; notes that these successes have happened in spite of the lack of high-standard facilities throughout Scotland, and calls on the Scottish Executive and sportscotland to increase the number of competition-standard facilities, including 50-metre swimming pools, across the nation. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Michael Matheson, Christine Grahame, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Mr Andrew Arbuckle, Carolyn Leckie, Mike Pringle, Bruce Crawford, Ms Sandra White, Mr Adam Ingram, Shiona Baird, Richard Lochhead, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Fiona Hyslop, Eleanor Scott, Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-4145 Sports Facilities (lodged on 20 March 2006) Linda Fabiani*, Frances Curran*
S2M-4145 Sports Facilities (lodged on 20 March 2006) Dennis Canavan*
